resources.string: Gear will be disconnected. Use Bluetooth to reconnect.
This will end your connection with %s.
Your %s will be disconnected from your mobile device. The next time you connect these devices, you must use Bluetooth. Any connections after that can be done via Remote connection.
%1$s is not installed on your mobile device. To use %2$s on your Gear, download %1$s to your mobile device.
Enable Call forwarding automatically while your Gear is disconnected from your mobile device. This will forward incoming calls from your mobile device to your Gear until the devices are reconnected.
To connect to a new device, the Gear will be reset to its factory settings.
The Gear is not fully set up. The setup wizard is currently open on the Gear, but to connect to the Gear, you need to open the setup wizard in Gear Manager on this device too.
The call forwarding functions Mobile to Gear and Gear to mobile cannot be enabled at the same time.
Forward incoming calls from your mobile device to your Gear.
Forward unanswered incoming calls from your phone to your Gear.
A request has been made to disable call forwarding from your mobile device to your Gear. The status of your mobile network and mobile device may affect the results.
A request has been made to enable call forwarding from your mobile device to your Gear. The status of your mobile network and mobile device may affect the results.

"When Gear is disconnected from your smartphone, incoming calls to mobile device will be forwarded to Gear automatically. - Your smartphone will ring a few times and then the call will be forwarded to your Gear. - If you do not answer the call on your Gear, the caller may leave voicemail that you can listen to on your Gear. Do you want to turn on auto call forwarding now?"

Call forwarding from your mobile device to your Gear is currently enabled. Incoming calls to your mobile device will be forwarded to your Gear. If you do not have your Gear with you, go to Settings and disable Auto forward calls to make sure you do not miss a call.
Switch the device that calls will be forwarded to automatically, depending on whether your devices are connected via Bluetooth or Remote connection.
Receive calls made to your mobile device on your Gear while you are moving and wearing the Gear and it is remotely connected to the mobile device.
New clock settings applied via Gear.
%1$s will be uninstalled and %2$s will be set as the default clock.
Your Gear has been reset. The Samsung Gear application will close shortly.
Your Gear has been reset. The Gear application will close shortly.
I understand and agree to the Terms and Conditions above.
Location Services have been disabled. Go to settings.
For the fastest and most accurate location detection, select High accuracy in Location > Mode.

By enabling “Share Location”, you agree that location data associated with your mobile phone and/or Gear device will be transmitted through a Samsung server in order to provide the Find My Gear & Find My Device service. No data or information about your device location is stored on the Samsung server.

By enabling \"%1$s & %2$s\", you acknowledge that location data associated with your mobile phone and/or Gear device will be transmitted through a Samsung server in order to provide the %1$s & %2$s service. No data or information about your device location is stored on the Samsung server.

By enabling \"%1$s & %2$s\", you acknowledge that location data associated with your mobile phone will be transmitted through a Samsung server in order to provide the %2$s service. No data or information about your device location is stored on the Samsung server.
After connecting to your %1$s, you can change its settings and install applications on it via %2$s.
After connecting to your Gear, you can change its settings and install applications on it via Gear Manager
Your device has not been connected. It will try to connect again.
Make sure that the following information is correct:
Tap OK to confirm and enable Auto call forwarding.
To enable Auto call forwarding, enable Remote connection, then try again.
Unable to use %s. Tap SETTINGS, go to App info > Permissions, then allow the following permissions and try again:
Depending on your service provider, separate subscriptions may be required to allow your mobile device and Gear to use this feature. This may result in additional charges.
To enable Auto call forwarding, set the phone numbers of the devices that you want to forward incoming calls to and from.
Share location will be disabled. You will not be able to use location information to search for your Gear or mobile device via Find My Gear or Find My Device.
Share location will be disabled. You will not be able to use location information to search for your mobile device via Find My Device.
Find My Gear and Find My Device
Receiving messages, emails, and notifications from the mobile device
Receiving emails and notifications from the mobile device
Remote connection will be disabled. The following functions will not be available until your Gear is connected to your mobile device via Bluetooth again:

Forward incoming calls from your mobile device to your Gear automatically while the Gear is disconnected. Depending on your service provider, this may result in additional charges. Tap OK to enable Auto call forwarding.

"This function will be able to read all the notifications you receive, which may include personal information such as contacts and messages sent to you. It will also be able to dismiss these notifications or select actions related to them. To receive notifications on your Gear, tap Enable, then enable %s."
Failed to enable Call forwarding. No response from T share.
To find your Gear, tap Start.The Gear will play a sound and its screen will be turned on.
To stop finding your Gear, tap Stop. The Gear will stop playing a sound and its screen will be turned off.
%1$s will be uninstalled, and the default font will be applied to your %2$s.
The application will be installed via Wi-Fi Direct. This will end your current Wi-Fi Direct connection. If you cancel the installation, you will need to download this application again to install it.
If you back up your data now, the current Gear backup data on the mobile device will be replaced by your latest Gear data.
If you restore your data, the data currently on your Gear will be deleted and replaced by your current Gear backup data.

"Use your device storage to back up your %1$s content: %2$s
If you previously backed up this content, you can restore it to %3$s now.
Depending on the size of the file, it may take some time."

"Use your mobile device storage to back up the following %1$s data: %2$s
If you previously backed up your %3$s data, you can restore it to your %4$s now.
This may take some time depending on the size of the files."
Your mobile device is now scanning for your Gear. This will take several minutes. It may be difficult to locate your Gear if it is indoors.
Gear locked. To unlock, connect Gear to mobile device via Bluetooth.
All calls to your mobile device will be forwarded to %s.
All unanswered calls to your Mobile device will be forwarded to %s.
To lock your Gear, Remote connection must first be enabled.
To reset your Gear, Remote connection must first be enabled.
Receive calls made to your Gear on your mobile device while the two devices are connected via Bluetooth.
Failed to find location. Try again later.
%d wallpapers will be removed from Gear Manager and your Gear.

"Voice Memo uses voice recognition technologies provided by a third party service provider called Nuance Communications, Inc. Therefore, your voice information is inevitably stored in a server operated by Nuance (in the United States), and using Voice Memo requires that you agree to the Terms and Conditions of Nuance. Nuance reserves the right to use your voice input for the purposes of improving services and developing technologies. Nuance also reserves the right to provide aforementioned voice input to Nuance's partners. Your voice input information is stored until the aforementioned objectives have been accomplished. For information of the Voice Memo services, please read the Samsung Privacy Policy and Nuance Privacy Policy. You cannot use Voice Memo if you do not agree to the provision of your information described above."
"Select the applications you want to receive notifications from on your %1$s. To save your %2$s's battery power, deselect applications that you do not want notifications from."
Block alerts from appearing on the Gear while the mobile device is being used.
Unable to enable Restrict notifications on your Gear. No screen lock is set on your mobile device.
By using Lock Gear, you can remotely lock your Gear to prevent unauthorised use. You may unlock the Gear by reconnecting it to the mobile device.
* The Lock Gear may take some time to function or may even fail depending on the state of your Gear, mobile device or network environment.
Unable to lock your Gear while your mobile device and Gear are connected via Bluetooth.
To enable Remote connection on your Gear, sign in to your Samsung account.

"Sign in to your Samsung account to use the following features even when not connected via Bluetooth: - Receiving notifications - Using applications via Remote connection Using Remote connection may result in additional charges."

"When you are not connected to your phone via Bluetooth, a Samsung account will let you do the following over mobile data: - Receive messages, emails, and other notifications - Use applications on Gear that need a connection to your phone via Remote connection.
Note that remote connection through your Samsung account uses your data plan."

"Calls dialed to your smartphone can be forwarded to your Gear. - Your smartphone will ring a few times and then the call will be forwarded to your Gear. - If you do not answer the call on your Gear, the caller may leave voicemail that you can listen to on your Gear. Do you want to enable call forwarding now?"

Call forwarding is a network service that diverts %s incoming calls to a specified number. Depending on your service provider, a subscription may be required to allow your Gear to use this feature. This may result in additional charges.
%1$s is not installed on your mobile device. To use %2$s on your Gear, download %1$s to your mobile device.
%1$s is not installed on your mobile device. To use %2$s on your Gear, download %1$s to your mobile device. You will be taken to the download screen.
%1$s has been uninstalled from your mobile device. To use %2$s on your Gear, download %1$s to your mobile device.
Receive calls made to your mobile device on the Gear while the two devices are remotely connected.
Show a list of notifications received on the Gear to the left of the clock.
To enable Auto call forwarding, open the Samsung Gear application on your mobile device and enable Remote connection, then try again.
While your Gear is in use, your notifications will be displayed as small pop-ups at the top of the screen, regardless of your selection above.
Some email accounts are not selected in Email settings. To receive notifications from those accounts on your Gear, select Email notifications in Email settings.
To send and receive messages on your Gear, your default messaging app will be changed from %s to Messaging.
Show a preview of received notifications, except for incoming call alerts and alarms, in the notification pop-ups on your Gear.

By enabling \"%1$s & %2$s\", you acknowledge that location data associated with your mobile phone and/or Gear device will be transmitted through a Samsung server in order to provide the %1$s & %2$s service. No data or information about your device location is stored on the Samsung server.

By enabling \"%1$s & %2$s\", you acknowledge that location data associated with your mobile phone will be transmitted through a Samsung server in order to provide the %2$s service. No data or information about your device location is stored on the Samsung server.

This app provides users the ability to interact with social media and the Internet in a variety of innovative ways. If you enable this app, the service will collect information about how you use the services, including how you view and interact with content and advertisements. For more details, please see the Flipboard %1$sTerms of Use%2$s and %3$sPrivacy Policy%4$s.
%s does not work properly so it has been uninstalled. It will now be reinstalled.
"To add app shortcuts to the Gear's home screen, go to Apps on the Gear, tap and hold an app icon, then drag and drop it on the home icon at the top of the screen."

"The clock is shown on the main page of your Gear's home screen. Pages to the left of the clock show notifications and those to the right show widgets. Swipe upwards from the bottom edge of the screen to view applications."
To open S Voice, say “Hi Gear” or press the home key twice while on any screen.
Double press the home key to open your favourite application. You can change your favourite application in Settings.
Double press the power key to open your favourite app. You can change your favourite app in Settings.
Swipe screen downwards from edge to go back.
Gear will be connected remotely if Bluetooth connection ends.
By using Reset Gear, you can remotely delete all data on your Gear. After such deletion, the deleted data cannot be restored and you can no longer use Find My Gear.
* The Reset Gear may take some time to function or may even fail depending on the state of your Gear, mobile device or network environment.

"Use your device storage to back up your %1$s content: %2$s
If you previously backed up this content, you can restore it to %3$s now.
Depending on the size of the file, it can take some time.
You can change your backup settings in Settings."
To enable Remote connection, update Samsung account manually.
A network error occurred while signing in to your Samsung account on your mobile device.
A network error occurred while signing in to your Samsung account on your mobile device.
An error has occurred. Try again.
Applications that have been downloaded via %1$s can be deleted when %2$s is uninstalled or application data is cleared. You can download deleted applications from your purchase history in %3$s.
Receive notifications, except incoming call alerts and alarms, on your Gear while its screen is turned off.
Disabled by administrator, encryption policy, or credential storage.

The Gear will be disconnected from your mobile network when it is connected to your mobile device via Bluetooth. When the connection via Bluetooth ends, the Gear will connect to your mobile network again automatically.
Depending on your service provider, you may require a separate subscription to use the Multi SIM function. Tap OK to enable Multi SIM.
To mute incoming calls and alarms, or pause media, place your hand on the screen while the screen is on.
Capture the screen by swiping your whole finger across it, keeping in contact with the screen.

When your Gear and mobile device are connected, Send help messages helps you in an emergency. It alerts your emergency message contacts to your situation by sending them emergency messages with your location. Sending these messages may result in additional charges. To enable Send help messages during an emergency, press the power key %d times.

When your Gear and mobile device are connected, Send help messages helps you in an emergency by taking a picture using the Gear camera. It alerts your emergency message contacts to your situation by sending them emergency messages with this picture and your location. The first message will contain both your location and the picture. Then, after an interval, a second message will be sent containing only your location. Sending these messages may result in additional charges. To enable Send help messages during an emergency, press the home key %d times.

When your Gear and mobile device are connected, Send help messages helps you in an emergency. It alerts your emergency message contacts to your situation by sending them emergency messages with your location. Sending these messages may result in additional charges. To enable Send help messages during an emergency, press the home key %d times.
Press the home key quickly 3 times to send a quick alert to your primary contacts when you are in an emergency situation.
Your primary contacts will receive emergency messages containing information about your current location.
Connect your mobile device to your Gear to use this function.
Set your mobile device to lock automatically when your Gear is too far away to be detected.
I have read and agree to all the terms and conditions above.
View content from your Gear on your mobile device by picking up your mobile device.
Wake up the Gear by raising the arm your Gear is on.

"To wake up the Gear, raise the arm that your Gear is on and look at the Gear's screen.
This feature does not work when you are leaning back or lying down, and may consume more of the Gear's battery power because its motion sensor is always on."
No primary contacts have been added. To enable %s, add contacts to Primary contacts.
Protect your device from harmful content by improving its security and service.

Installing from unknown sources may be harmful to your device and personal data. By tapping OK, you agree that you are solely responsible for any damage to your device or loss of data that may result from using these applications.
Allow installation of apps from unknown sources.
"Allow Find My Gear and Find My Device to share your Gear and mobile device's location data."
I agree that Mobile data may be used and that MMS messages may be sent in emergencies. I understand that this may result in additional charges.

"1. [Send Help Message] is intended to help users send notice of their approximate location and visual/auditory surroundings to the mobile phone of a chosen contact that you set in advance. It is made available only for your convenience and is not intended as, nor should it be treated as, a substitute for emergency calls to the authorities.
2. [Send Help Message] (the “Services”) may not work accurately, continuously or error-free, depending on the circumstances such as network connectivity, availability of GPS/Wi-Fi information, status and/or condition of your/your chosen contact´s device, battery level and/or other circumstances which are out of Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. (“Samsung”, “we”, “us”, “our”)´s control. The accuracy of the location information and timely delivery of the Services may be affected by your surroundings and the condition of your device and the device of your chosen contact. Unless otherwise expressly stated or legally required, Samsung disclaims any warranty that the Services will work accurately, continuously or without any error. Please note that your chosen contact must be a working mobile phone and the device must be turned on and capable of accepting text messages. Transferring your surroundings and location data may be chargeable to you depending on the fees specified by your service operator.
In order for the Services to function as intended, it may be necessary to have the feature, once deployed by you, automatically turn on the GPS and Wi-Fi functions of your device. You acknowledge and agree to the automatic enabling of the GPS and Wi-Fi functions (if required), without further notice to you or consent by you.
3. You acknowledge and agree not to misuse this function or use this function for any illegal purposes or to infringe on the privacy or any personal or proprietary rights of others. Use this function only in accordance with the law and only in cases of emergencies.You agree to be solely responsible for your use of this feature. Samsung shall not be liable for any outcome that may arise from your use of this feature.
4. The Services are made available only for your convenience and are not intended as, nor should they be treated as, a substitute for emergency calls to the authorities. Unless otherwise expressly stated or legally required, Samsung disclaims any warranty that the Services will work accurately, continuously or without any error.
5. DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES. YOU EXPRESSLY UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT:
A. THE SERVICES ARE PROVIDED ON AN AS IS, “WITH ALL FAULTS,” AND AS AVAILABLE BASIS. YOU BEAR THE RISK OF USING THEM. SAMSUNGGIVES NO EXPRESS WARRANTIES, GUARANTEES, OR CONDITIONS UNDER OR IN RELATION TO THE SERVICES. SAMSUNG EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS ALL REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO ANY IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NON-INFRINGEMENT, AND ANY IMPLIED WARRANTIES FROM COURSE OF DEALING OR COURSE OF PERFORMANCE.
B. WITHOUT LIMITING THE FOREGOING,SAMSUNG MAKES NO REPRESENTATION OR WARRANTY THAT (i) THE SERVICES WILL MEET YOUR REQUIREMENTS, (ii) THE SERVICES WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED, TIMELY, SECURE, OR ERROR-FREE, (iii) THE CONTENT OBTAINED FROM THE SERVICES, OR ANY NOTIFICATIONS OR FUNCTIONALITY OF THE SERVICES WILL BE AVAILABLE, ACCURATE, COMPLETE OR RELIABLE, (iv) THE QUALITY OF THE SERVICES OR ANY INFORMATION, OR OTHER MATERIAL OBTAINED BY YOU THROUGH THE SERVICES WILL MEET YOUR EXPECTATIONS, OR (v) ANY ERRORS OR BUGS IN THE SERVICES WILL BE CORRECTED.
6. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY.
A. YOU EXPRESSLY UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT SAMSUNG SHALL NOT BE LIABLE UNDER A NEGLIGENCE THEORY, FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, PUNITIVE, CONSEQUENTIAL OR EXEMPLARY LOSS, LIABILITY, DAMAGE OR EXPENSE, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, LOSS OF PROFITS, LOSS OF USE OR OTHER LOSSES (EVEN IF REPAIR, REPLACEMENT OR A REFUND FOR THE SERVICES DOES NOT FULLY COMPENSATE YOU FOR ANY LOSSES ORSAMSUNG KNEW OR SHOULD HAVE KNOWN OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH LOSS, LIABILITY, DAMAGE, OR EXPENSE), DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY RESULTING FROM OR ARISING OUT OF: (i) CLAIMS FOR BREACH OF CONTRACT, BREACH OF WARRANTY, GUARANTEE OR CONDITION, STRICT LIABILITY, NEGLIGENCE, OR OTHER TORT TO THE EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW; (ii) YOUR USE OR YOUR INABILITY TO USE THE SERVICES, (iii) THE COST OF PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE SERVICES; (iv) UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS TO OR ALTERATION OF YOUR TRANSMISSIONS OR DATA; (v) STATEMENTS OR CONDUCT OF ANY THIRD PARTY; (vi) THIS AGREEMENT; (vii) INJURY TO PERSON OR PROPERTY (INCLUDING DEATH), OR (viii) ANY OTHER MATTER RELATING TO THE SERVICES OR THE CONTENT PROVIDED THROUGH THE SERVICES.
B. YOUR SOLE AND EXCLUSIVE REMEDY FOR ANY DISPUTE WITH SAMSUNG RELATED TO THIS AGREEMENT OR THE SERVICES SHALL BE CEASING USE OF THE SERVICES.
C. SOME JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW THE EXCLUSION OF CERTAIN WARRANTIES OR THE LIMITATION OR EXCLUSION OF LIABILITY FOR INCIDENTAL OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES. ACCORDINGLY, SOME OF THE ABOVE LIMITATIONS OF SECTIONS 5 AND 6 MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU.
7. INDEMNIFICATION. You agree to hold harmless, indemnify and defend the Samsung from and against any claims, actions, demands, costs, liabilities, losses, damages, fines and expenses (including reasonable attorneys' fees and costs) arising out of or relating to your use of the Services or any failure by you to comply with this Agreement. If, despite the personal nature of the licenses granted to you under these terms and conditions, you allow any individual to use the Services, or provide to any individual any information received via the Services, you agree to inform such individual of the existence and provisions of these terms and conditions, which shall be binding upon such individual, and you agree to hold harmless, indemnify, and defend the Samsung from any and all claims, actions, demands, costs, liabilities, losses, damages, fines and expenses (including attorneys' fees and costs) related to such individual’s use of the Services.

I agree to allow %1$s to share my location with my %2$s contacts.
Double tap any screen with two fingers to view the brightness and volume controls, and other useful information.
Mobile data is disabled. Connect to WLAN instead, or enable mobile data and try again.
Mobile data is disabled. Connect to Wi-Fi network instead, or enable mobile data and try again.
Selecting SIM cards for outgoing calls
I understand and agree to the Terms and Conditions above.

"You agree to provide Samsung the error log data from any Software Update failure your device experiences. This will assist Samsung to improve and enhance Samsung's Software Update process and ultimately help you keep your device properly updated."
Connect to your Gear remotely, using Mobile data or Wi-Fi together with your Samsung account.
Connect to your Gear remotely, using Mobile data or WLAN together with your Samsung account.

Connecting your %1$s to your %2$s via Bluetooth will disconnect your %3$s from your mobile device temporarily. This connection will resume shortly and your %4$s will then be connected to both your %5$s and your mobile device.
Install additional text-to-speech languages on your Gear.
Your text-to-speech language is the language you set in your Gear Settings. If your language is not supported by the text-to-speech engine, English (United Kingdom) will be used.
Failed to connect your Gear to your mobile device. Try again later.
Unable to open this application because it is disabled.

%1$s will not be installed via %2$s. Your device and personal data are more vulnerable to attack by applications from unknown sources. You agree that you are solely responsible for any damage to your device or loss of data that may result from using these applications. To always install applications from unknown sources, go to %3$s > %4$s > %5$s, and enable %6$s. Tap OK to install %7$s.

%1$s is not from %2$s, and it does not include an app for your Gear. Your device and data are more vulnerable to attack by apps from unknown sources. The installation will be cancelled and %3$s will be deleted from your phone.
Say “Answer” or “Reject”, during the pauses while your Gear is not ringing or vibrating, to answer or reject calls.
Only download updates when connected to a Wi-Fi network.
Only downloadable when connected via WLAN

"[Send Help Message] is intended to help users send notice of their approximate location and visual/auditory surroundings to the mobile phone of an emergency contact that you set in advance. It is made available only for your convenience and is not intended as, nor should it be treated as, a substitute for emergency calls to the authorities.
[Send Help Message] may not work accurately, continuously or error-free, depending on the circumstances such as network connectivity, availability of GPS/WLAN information, status and/or condition of your/your emergency contact夷늮 device, battery level and/or other circumstances which are out of Samsung夷늮 control. The accuracy of the location information and timely delivery of [Send Help Message] data may be affected by your surroundings and the condition of your device and the device of your emergency contact. Unless otherwise expressly stated or legally required, Samsung disclaims any warranty that the [Send Help Message] function will work accurately, continuously or without any error. Please note that your emergency contact must be a working mobile phone and the device must be turned on and capable of accepting text messages. Transferring your surroundings and location data may be chargeable to you depending on the fees specified by your service operator.
In order for [Send Help Message] to function as intended, it is necessary to have the feature, once deployed by you, automatically turn on the GPS and WLAN functions of your device. You acknowledge and agree to the automatic enabling of the GPS and WLAN functions, without further notice to you or consent by you.
You acknowledge and agree not to misuse this function or use this function for any illegal purposes or to infringe on the privacy or any personal or proprietary rights of others. Use this function only in accordance with the law and only in cases of emergencies. You agree to be solely responsible for your use of this feature. Samsung shall not be liable for any outcome that may arise from your use of this feature."

By enabling Share Location, you agree that location data associated with your mobile phone will be transmitted to your Gear device through a Samsung server in order to provide the Find My Device service. No data or information about your device location is stored on the Samsung server.
Voice service should be activated on Gear S SIM to receive calls via Auto Call Forwarding. Please check with your network provider for services enabled on your SIM
You can use call forwarding when Gear is remotely connected to your mobile device.
"SAP connection lost. please re-connect your Gear and try again"
I understand and agree to ALL of the above.
Services will be available only after you indicate your acknowledgement. Click each separately to ONLY choose a specific service.

The OpenSSL toolkit stays under a dual license, i.e. both the conditions of the OpenSSL License and the original SSLeay license apply to the toolkit. See below for the actual license texts. Actually both licenses are BSD-style Open Source licenses. In case of any license issues related to OpenSSL please contact openssl-core@openssl.org.
